roleset.name: move from one place to another

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: Here we offer a review of bone marrow transplants and other types of stem cell transplants that are used to treat cancer.

example.name: 'his' is arg 2 here because he is the receipient/end point. If there is a more specific location included (ie femur), then 'his' would be GOL

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to transplant.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.
